EmailTemplate.name: TCS Charity Partner Sign ups
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge Graduation Sign-Ups
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Graduation Sign-Ups
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
At Graduation in October you signed up to volunteer with {!Contact.TCSKO_sign_up__c}. If you would like to stay involved then please get in touch with{!Account.00NC0000005ENfs} {!Account.00NC0000005EQIB} {!Account.00NC0000005EQI6}. {!Account.TCSKO_special_contact_instructions__c}.
Don't forget to check out our website www.thechallengesociety.org for upcoming events and to update your personal Challenge Society profile!
Happy Holidays!
All the best,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network
www.the-challenge.org Follow us on Twitter and Facebook The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
